title: One arrested after accidental Christmas Day shooting in Westfield
content:
WESTFIELD - One person is facing charges after an apparently accidental shooting on Christmas.
Officers responded to a home on Sackett Street at about 4 p.m. on Sunday, Dec. 25. One victim suffered a single gunshot wound to the lower leg, according to Sgt. Jeff Baillargeon.
The injury is not believed to be life-threatening.
Police arrested one person, whose name was not immediately released. The shooting remains under investigation by Westfield detectives.
